In ____ to ____ all ____ the ____, they ____ the ____ of ____ technicians ____ a specialist ____. data.partBlankContent: At the beginning of every year, the company I work for typically hires a large number of technicians. In or___ to man___ all o_ the techn______, they outs_____ the manag_____ of th___ technicians t_ a specialist com____. This cont____ management com____ is respo______ for arra_____ physical sp___ for t__ technicians, overs_____ their pers____ and profes______ needs, a__ providing th__ with state-of-the-art equi_____. This saves my company from a lot of managerial hassle and lets us focus on our core business.
data.answer: 每年年初，我工作的公司通常会招聘大量的技术人员。为了管理所有的技术人员，他们将这些技术人员的管理外包给了一家专业公司。该合约管理公司负责为技术人员安排场地，监督他们的个人和专业需求，并为他们提供最先进的设备。这为我的公司省去了很多管理上的麻烦，让我们专注于我们的核心业务。
